plot: Alice, the house owner, and her loyal surgeon await their guests who gather for a tea party, where botox will also be served.
title: The Tea Party
plot_es: Alice, the house owner, and her loyal surgeon await their guests who gather for a tea party, where botox will also be served.
plot_en: Alice, the house owner, and her loyal surgeon await their guests who gather for a tea party, where botox will also be served.
